descriptionSections.title: Discord Bot
commands: Used to configure the bot for your server‚Ä¢ If the bot has never been configured: all users can use this command‚Ä¢ If the bot has an existing setting for the server, only members of the management group or the owner of the Discord server can change the setting
The commands are explained by the bot
Displays the link to the website associated with the bot
Displays help information about Conqueror's Blade
Update the weapon played with by your hero
Generates a connection token for the mobile application
Manual reset of GvG registration reaction message (manager only)
Activate or deactivate the GvG registration message (manager only)

descriptionSections.title: List of parameter Discord Bot need (command /config)
commands: Language in which the Discord bot will send messages on Discord
Chan Discord where users will register (message with reaction buttons).
Chan Discord or information messages to the bot user will be displayed (new unit added, etc.).
Chan Discord or administration information messages will be displayed (user leaves Discord and is deleted from the database).
Group who will have access to the website to fill in their details (barrack, lvl, etc.).
Group who will have access to the Discord bot administration.

accueil.description: What is Easy Management GvG?</br>It's a territory war management system for the Conqueror's Blade game.</br>This system is made up of 3 interconnected applications:</br>un bot Discord, ce site internet et une application mobile.
